wikipedia_page.main: Paul Swift is a British driver best known for Stunt Driving, autotesting, precision driving, and his involvement in live-action arena shows, motor shows including the UK Motorshow and Top Gear Live.

response: Swift currently resides in the village of Finghall, North Yorkshire.  His son, Paul Swift, is also an Autotest champion.
Paul Swift (August 18, 1934 – October 7, 1994) was an American film actor.
